note: The updated Advanced Virtualization module is now available for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8.2.1 Advanced Virtualization.

The Advanced Virtualization module provides the user-space component for running virtual machines that use KVM in environments managed by Red Hat products.
This update fixes a number of bugs and adds various enhancements to Advanced Virtualization.
